name: DailyDadJoke
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can depend on us to deliver you a guaranteed* groan-worthy dad joke that you'll want to share** with your family, friends and co-workers.

A new joke will arrive on your Alexa device each and every day, performed for you by a real, live dad.

In other words, this is exactly the skill you've been looking for all your life.

Oh...and if you'd like to be able to access these jokes on demand, outside of your regular Flash Briefing, try adding our "Daily Dad Joke On Demand" skill...you get the same great jokes, but on your own schedule.

* not guaranteed
** you won't want to share it, but we know you probably will anyway
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
